org.eclipse.dataset.roi

Class HyperbolicROI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.ROIBase
      • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.OrientableROIBase
        • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.HyperbolicROI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, INameable, IOrientableROI, IParametricROI, IROI

    public class HyperbolicROI
extends OrientableROIBase
implements IParametricROI, java.io.Serializable
    A hyperbolic region of interest with the start point as the focus. In the rotated frame, it can be represented as (x+l/e)^2 / a^2 - y^2 / b^2 = 1, where l = b^2/a and e = sqrt(1 + b^2/a^2)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • HyperbolicROI

        public HyperbolicROI()
        No argument constructor need for serialization

      • HyperbolicROI

        public HyperbolicROI(double semi,
                     double eccentricity,
                     double ptx,
                     double pty)
        Create a hyperbolic ROI
        Parameters:
        semi - semi-latus rectum (half length of chord parallel to directrix, passing through focus)
        eccentricity - measure of non-circularity (>1)
        ptx - centre point x value
        pty - centre point y value

      • HyperbolicROI

        public HyperbolicROI(double semi,
                     double eccentricity,
                     double angle,
                     double ptx,
                     double pty)
        Create a hyperbolic ROI
        Parameters:
        semi - semi-latus rectum (half length of chord parallel to directrix, passing through focus)
        eccentricity - measure of non-circularity (>1)
        angle - major axis angle
        ptx - centre point x value
        pty - centre point y value
